John McClaughry is completely wrong - again:
“Who pays for these expensive liberal pipe dreams”
should instead be: “We’re ALL (*) paying, every single day - when will we invest in actual solutions?”

(* “ALL” of course refers to everyone excepy McLaughry and other “conervatives” and “libertarians”, who manage to foist most of the cost of their privilege, on the rest of us.)
